description: Transport both of your bike wheels conveniently and safely.  Holds 2 wheels up to 29in.Made of sturdy polyester that's polyurethane coated for water resistance.Integrated axle protection.Integrated pocket for stowing small items.Internal divider keeps wheels from banging into each other.Carry handles.Loops for attaching a shoulder strap (not included).
name: EVOC Two Wheel Bag
